userStories.title: Final QA - run full test suite
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to verify all tests pass so that the migration is complete.
acceptanceCriteria: pnpm type-check passes with no errors
pnpm lint passes with no errors
pnpm test passes with all tests green
No TypeScript any types in new code
Logger is used in all layouts
userStories.notes: Run all quality checks and fix any issues

userStories.title: Create final PR to main
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a PR created so that all pages can be reviewed and merged.
acceptanceCriteria: All previous stories in this PRD pass
PR is created with gh pr create
PR title follows convention: feat(buio): all pages and final QA
userStories.notes: Use gh pr create --title 'feat(buio): all pages and final QA' --body '...'
